## Our Mission {.c .center-v background-image="assets/bg/bg8.png"}

::: {.fragment .center-h style="margin-top:50px;"}
**We teach students to "think with data"**
:::
::: {.fragment .center-h style="margin-bottom:50px;"}
**with a liberal arts teaching philosophy**
:::
::: {.incremental}
- Across-the-curriculum approach
- Interdisciplinarity & disciplinary relevance of data science
- Real problems; hands-on experience
:::

## Data Encounters {.c background-image="assets/bg/bg14.png"}

![](assets/antq1.jpg){.absolute top="15%" right="-30%" height="650px"}
![](assets/antq4.jpg){.absolute top="15%" right="50%" height="650px"}

::: {.fragment}
::: {.incremental .absolute left="0%" top="27%" style="padding: 0.25em 0.25em; background-color: rgba(255, 225, 225, 0.75);"}
1. Find a UCR course with a supportive instructor
1. Find a research question and data relevant to the course
1. Develop hands-on workshops to guide students through answering the research question
1. Develop assignments so students practice their new skills
:::
:::

## Apprenticeship Program {.c background-image="assets/bg/bg18.png"}

::: {.fragment .center-h style="margin-top:20px;"}

::: {.incremental}

:::
::: {.fragment .center-h}
**4-week intensive program**
:::
::: {.incremental}
